name: Appliance Care
description: Extend the life of your major appliances and improve efficiency with these essential maintenance tasks.

templates.name: Refrigerator Coil Cleaning
templates.description: Clean condenser coils to improve cooling efficiency and reduce energy costs.
instructions: Remove base grille if coils are underneath
Use coil brush to gently remove dust
Replace grille and plug back in
safetyPrecautions: Be gentle with delicate coil fins

templates.name: Dishwasher Filter Cleaning
templates.description: Clean dishwasher filter and spray arms for better cleaning performance.
instructions: Scrub with soft brush to remove debris
Check spray arm holes for clogs
Clean spray arm holes with toothpick
safetyPrecautions: Run garbage disposal first to clear drain line
Check for broken glass before reaching in

templates.name: Washing Machine Descaling
templates.description: Remove mineral buildup and mold from washing machine for fresh, clean laundry.
instructions: Run empty hot water cycle with 2 cups white vinegar
Pause mid-cycle and let sit for 1 hour
Run second empty cycle with 1/2 cup baking soda
Wipe drum, door seal, and detergent dispenser
Leave door open to air dry
safetyPrecautions: Keep door open after cleaning to prevent mold

templates.name: Oven Deep Clean
templates.description: Thorough cleaning of oven interior for safe cooking and better heat distribution.
instructions: Remove racks and soak in hot soapy water
If using self-clean: remove everything, run cycle
If manual: apply oven cleaner, wait per instructions
Wipe down interior walls and floor
Clean oven door glass (inside and out)
safetyPrecautions: Ensure good ventilation when using cleaners
Let oven cool completely before cleaning

templates.name: Range Hood Filter Cleaning
templates.description: Clean grease filters for proper kitchen ventilation and fire prevention.
instructions: Fill sink with hot water and degreasing dish soap
safetyPrecautions: Let filters cool if recently used
